footer.office: ©2020 Federal Office of Public Health FOPH

errors.title: Coronavirus check
errors.unexpected: An unexpected error has occurred. Please retry.

intro.title: Coronavirus check
intro.description: Answer all the questions in the check. Then you will be given a recommendation of what to do.

disclaimer.title: Important notice:
disclaimer.main: The coronavirus check is not a substitute for medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. The symptoms described in the check may also occur in relation to other diseases requiring different measures.
disclaimer.advice: Always consult a doctor if you have obvious symptoms that get worse or worry you.

profile.title: Personal details
profile.description: Specify your gender, age and canton.

age.label: Age
age.disclaimer: The entered age can influence the result.
age.invalid: You must enter an age between 0 and 120.

canton.label: Canton
canton.invalid: Please write the full name of your canton.

profile.symptomsQuestion: Select all the symptoms you currently have in the list.
profile.symptomsDescription: You can also select more than one symptom or tick the «No symptom» field. At least one field must be selected.

symptoms.gastro: Gastrointestinal symptoms (nausea, vomiting, diarrhoea, stomach ache)
symptoms.lostSmellOrTaste: Sudden loss of sense of smell and/or taste
